entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sackville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:03 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 97 %

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. High minus 1 except plus 5 over southern sections. POP 60%
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle or freezing drizzle. Risk of a thundershower near noon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 1 except plus 5 over southern sections. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or freezing drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
